level.heading: First Source employment; inapplicable.
level.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the requirements of Subchapter X of Chapter 2 of Title 2 pertaining to government-assisted non-construction projects shall not apply to a Qualified Social E-Commerce Company receiving a benefit pursuant to this subchapter; specifically, ยง 2-219.03(e)(1), pertaining to government-assisted non-construction projects, and ยง 2- 219.03(e)(1C), pertaining to hiring and reporting requirements in government-assisted non-construction projects.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-174, see notes under ยง 47-1818.01.
